duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage IT projects and ensure delivery within the defined scope, schedule, and budget.
Identify and manage project risks, ensuring that appropriate mitigation plans are in place.
Utilize analytical skills to support risk selection and underwriting processes.
Communicate with team members, stakeholders, and external partners effectively.
Contribute to business planning and capital setting for underwriting and risk management.
Mentor and guide less experienced team members in project management and underwriting processes.
Lead and collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop process improvements and product enhancements.
Fill in for other team members to ensure project continuity during peak periods or when team members are unavailable.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Information Technology, Business, or related field (Master's preferred)
